pages.title: Black Tarantula
pages.text: Grammostola pulchra is a species of tarantula ($(o)family Theraphosidae$()), native to Brazil.$(br2)It is known for its solid black body, which makes it an appealing tarantula for the pet trade.

pages.title: Black Tarantula
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
